game.name: Out of Order zero
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 카메라 움직임 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: Shout at up to 4 friends in this chaotic colour sorting game. The towers are constantly rising, so you must sort them quickly. Purchase items and discover pets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Shout at up to 4 friends in this chaotic colour sorting game. The towers are constantly rising, so you must sort them quickly. Purchase items and discover pets.
